#include <stdio.h>
#include <stdlib.h>
#include <math.h>
int sumfn(int n);
 
 
int main(int argc, char *argv[])
{
  
    //printf("\nenter the number of test case");
    int t;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    int i=0;
    while(i<t)
     {
              //printf("\nenter the number");
              int n;
              scanf("%d",&n);
              int sum=sumfn(n);
              printf("%d\n",(int)pow(2,sum)*n);
              i++;
     }
    //getch();
    return 0;
}
int sumfn(int n)
{
    int sum=0;
    while(n)
     {
            sum=sum+n%10;
            n=n/10;
     }
    return sum;
}
